Package it.polimi.ingsw.VirtualView

Class VirtualView

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.VirtualView.VirtualView
public class VirtualView extends Object
This class represents the virtual view of the game. It is responsible for managing communication between the game model and the client handlers.

  • Constructor Summary

      Retrieves the client handler associated with the specified nickname.
      Parameters:
      nickname - The nickname of the client.
      Returns:
      The client handler associated with the nickname, or null if not found.
